product_name: The North Face Better Than Naked T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked men's T-shirt offers excellent comfort for racing or long-distance training. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Ventilation panels under the arms, along the sides of the torso and down the back increase breathability. Stitchless seams reduce chafing. Reflective logos increase your visibility in low light. The Better Than Naked T-shirt is part of The North Face Flight Series(TM), developed and tested by outdoor athletes. Closeout.
short_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked men's T-shirt offers excellent comfort for racing or long-distance training.
